word: 8 (1 Timothy 4:1;  6:20; 2 Timothy 2:14-18, 23-26; see EGW on 1 John 2:18). Nature Exalted Above Nature's God.--No man can ever truly excel in knowledge and influence unless he is connected with the God of wisdom and power. . . . All the philosophies of human nature have led to confusion and shame when God has not been recognized as all in all. . . .
